queries.query:
from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BATTERY_SOC")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BATTERY_VOLTAGE_VDC")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BATTERY_CHARGE_W" or r["_field"] == "BATTERY_DRAW_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.query:
from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BATTERY_DRAW_A" or r["_field"] == "BATTERY_CHARGE_A")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "USAGE_kWh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "INVERTER_POWER_W" or r["_field"] == "SOLAR_POWER_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SOLAR_VOLTAGE_VDC" or r["_field"] == "SOLAR_POWER_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "USAGE_kWh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30d, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "INVERTER_POWER_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SOLAR_kWh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SOLAR_kWh")

from(bucket: "solar_data")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SOLAR_POWER_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "DC_TEMP_C" or r["_field"] == "AC_TEMP_C" or r["_field"] == "TR_TEMP_C")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "INVERTER_POWER_W")
